description: Number of prime divisors of 1 + (product of first n primes).
links: Hisanori Mishima, Factorizations of many number sequences
R. G. Wilson v, Explicit factorizations
mathematica: a[q_] := Module[{x, n}, x=FactorInteger[Product[Table[Prime[i], {i, q}][[j]], {j, q}]+1]; n=Length[x]; Sum[Table[x[[i]][[2]], {i, n}][[j]], {j, n}]]
author: Arne Ring (arne.ring(AT)epost.de), May 30 2000
extensions: More terms from _Robert G. Wilson v_, Mar 24 2001
a(44)-a(81) from _Charles R Greathouse IV_, May 07, 2011
